description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Major Features and Improvements

* Alternative for SecurityOptions.Auto, but without possibility of SecurityOptions.None
* Encoding detection while loading .vcs files


All Changes

Enhancements

EMAILNET-35247 - Retain Content disposition and Content-Transfer-Encoding while saving and loading an Email
EMAILNET-35278 - Alternative for SecurityOptions.Auto, but without possibility of SecurityOptions.None 

Bugs

EMAILNET-35262 - IEWSClient: ExchangeQueryBuilder.To field returns empty results
EMAILNET-35266 - MapiConversionOption.PreserveOriginalAddresses = true, is not working on ReplyTo
EMAILNET-35267 - EML can't be converted to XPS
EMAILNET-35275 - SetBodyContent() breaks the special character €
EMAILNET-35276 - Properties disappear when message is fetched from Pst
EMAILNET-35277 - Body lost while converting EML to MSG
EMAILNET-38399 - ImapClient cannot rename folder to a name containing special characters like double quote (")
EMAILNET-38400 - Error While Fetching Emails Of Folder that contains double quotes(") in folder Name
EMAILNET-38405 - Creating Forwarded Message doesn't include To address and brackets for the email address
EMAILNET-38409 - Subject can't be read from EML
EMAILNET-38410 - Adding value to Header raises error
EMAILNET-38413 - VCF files created by Aspose.Email are corrupted and cannot be opened Thunder bird, Google Mail, Apple Address book
EMAILNET-34849 - FolderInfo.AddMessages raises ArgumentNullException sometimes
EMAILNET-35248 - Length cannot be less than zero exception while loading the attached VCS files
EMAILNET-35249 - Specified argument was out of the range of valid values exception raised while loading the VCS files
EMAILNET-35250 - Object reference not set to an instance of object exception raised while loading the VCS files
EMAILNET-35259 - Exception while saving MapiMessage after replacing the attachment
EMAILNET-35260 - "Specified argument was out of the range of valid values." exception while converting MapiMessage to MailMessage using InterpretAsTnef
EMAILNET-35261 - Adding MapiRecipient raises "The Exchange Address is not in a recognized format" exception
EMAILNET-35263 - Invalid URI exception when adding email to PST
EMAILNET-35264 - Null Reference Exception when converting Calendar EML to MapiMessage
EMAILNET-35265 - Exception on Content-Transfer-Encoding: x-uuencode
EMAILNET-35269 - Exception "Length cannot be less than zero" raised while converting EML to MapiMessaage
EMAILNET-35270 - Exception "The address of recipient can't be null or empty" raised while converting eml to MapiMessage
EMAILNET-35271 - Exception "String was not recognized as a valid Boolean" raised while converting EML to MapiMessage
EMAILNET-35272 - Exception "Input string was not in correct format" raised while converting EML to MapiMessage
EMAILNET-35273 - Exception "String was not recognized as a valid DateTime" raised while converting EML to MapiMessage
EMAILNET-35274 - Exception "The address of recipient can't be null or empty" raised while converting eml to MapiMessage - .NET
EMAILNET-38397 - Creating Forward Message raises ArgumentNullException
EMAILNET-38398 - Creating Forward Message from EML to MSG raises ArgumentNullException
EMAILNET-38402 - List Messages by Page raises exception
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
